name: @runanywhere/web-root
description: RunAnywhere Web SDK - On-device AI for the browser via RACommons WASM

scripts.build:ts: npm run build -w packages/core && npm run build -w packages/llamacpp && npm run build -w packages/onnx
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w packages/core && npm run lint -w packages/llamacpp && npm run lint -w packages/onnx
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w packages/core && npm run typecheck -w packages/llamacpp && npm run typecheck -w packages/onnx
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/core/dist packages/llamacpp/dist packages/onnx/dist packages/llamacpp/wasm/*.wasm packages/llamacpp/wasm/*.js wasm/build
